News.headline: Loan Update: 3rd January 2017
News.short_description: Update on Daggers Loan players Barnwell, Assombalonga and Shepherd
News.description:
Shomari Barnwell started his first game for Bishop's Stortford on Sunday January 1st against Essex side Chelmsford City, the Blues lost the game 3-1, Barnwell had chances to score although he was denied by Chelmsford keeper Fitzsimons.

Daggers right back Jimmy Shepherd started his second game on loan at Billericay Town yesterday with a 2-1 win over Tonbridge Angels, the young full back almost landed his first assist for the club after getting into a great position to find Billericay striker Johnson who headed the ball just wide.

Finally Christian Assombalonga registered his second appearance for National League South side St Albans City who lost the game 2-1 on the 1st Janauary 2017, with former Daggers player Jamie Cureton getting the only goal for The Saints.Â
